sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update display travel start and work end</description>
        <name>Update display travel start and work end</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var taskRec = new GlideRecord("wm_task");
taskRec.addEncodedQuery("stateIN12,16,17,18");
taskRec.query();

while (taskRec.next()) {
    try {
        new global.FSMTimeUtil().updateDisplayDateTimeFields(taskRec);
    } catch (e) {
        gs.error("Error: Update display travel start and work end " + e + " " + taskRec.getValue("sys_id"));
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-01-03 22:36:54</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>aae9f227bd042110fa9b17c5c2fd26c6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update display travel start and work end</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">25371ef01b8a21109c18a9f9bc4bcb1e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_aae9f227bd042110fa9b17c5c2fd26c6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-01-03 23:00:10</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
